# Spider Climb (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Spider Climb (Su):***** The ninja can cast [[Spider Climb (Spell)|spider climb]] as if she was a sorcerer of the same level. Each use of this ability uses up 1 ki point.

**Source:** Ultimate Options Power of the Ninja (Super Genius Games), pg. 19
